device.notFoundErrorDesc: Ensure your device is properly connected and unlocked.

ledger.waitingAppClose: Waiting for the app to be closed
ledger.waitingAppReady: Waiting for the app to be ready
ledger.userDeniedOpenApp: Ergo app opening denied by the user

receive: Avoid sending more than {count} tokens in a single transaction to this wallet. Limited device memory could cause your funds to become inaccessible.
receive.newAddressErrorFallbackMessage: Unable to generate a new address.

qrCode.title: Address QR code
qrCode.description: Scan this QR code to receive assets in {address}.

verify.title: Address Verification
verify.description: Ensure that the displayed address and path match exactly what appears on your device.
verify.unknownVerificationError: An unknown error occurred while verifying the address.

history.empty: You have no transaction history yet.

send.addAllAssetsDesc: Add all assets to the sending list.
send.minNamedAssetError: You need at least {min} {asset} to send this transaction.
send.minFeeError: You need to pay a minimum fee of {min} {name} to send this transaction.
send.noSelectedAssetsError: Please select at least one asset to send this transaction.

sign.newTokenDesc: This token will be minted in this transaction.
sign.burningDesc: The assets listed below will be lost. Only continue if you know exactly what are you doing.
sign.successDesc: Your transaction has been successfully signed and sent.

wallet.wrongPasswordDesc: Please enter the correct spending password.
wallet.xPubKeyDesc: Extended public keys allow viewing transaction history and generating new addresses, but they cannot spend or move funds in any way.
wallet.minSpendingPasswordLength: Spending password must be at least {min} characters long.
wallet.infoStepDesc: This information will be used to identify and protect your wallet.

alerts.demurrageDesc: UTxOs holding tokens must have sufficient ERG to cover demurrage fee, or you risk losing them. Consolidate your assets to avoid this.
alerts.fragmentationDesc: Consider optimizing your wallet for improved performance and efficiency.

index.title: Welcome to Nautilus Wallet
index.subtitle: Choose an option to get started
index.kyaAgreement: By proceeding, you agree to Nautilus' {termsOfUse}

create.recoveryPhraseDoNotMatch: The recovery phrase does not match the original one.
create.secretStepDesc: These words are the keys to your wallet. Make sure you save them in a secure location.
create.secretConfirmStepDesc: Complete the missing parts of your recovery phrase.

import.importStep: Insert the Extended Public Key of your wallet.
import.importStepDesc: Select the type of secret you want to use and fill it out.

connect.verificationUnknownError: An unknown error occurred while verifying the address.
connect.successDesc: Your Ledger device has been successfully connected. You can now open Nautilus Wallet in the browser's {viewMode}.

global.displayLanguageDesc: Select the language for the Nautilus Wallet interface.
global.conversionCurrencyDesc: Select the currency for conversion rates.
global.devModeDesc: Enable developer mode to access advanced features.
global.tokenBlacklistsDesc: Manage token blacklists to hide unwanted tokens.
global.nsfwTokensBlacklistDesc: Hide NSFW (Not Safe For Work) tokens.
global.unsupportedServerVersion: Unsupported server version. Nautilus requires at least version {version}.
global.experimentalDesc: The features under this section are marked as experimental, which means they're not stable. Use it with caution, as it may contain bugs or undergo significant changes. It's a work in progress, so expect some rough edges.
global.zeroConfDesc: 0-conf, short for zero-confirmations, lets you to spend assets without waiting for confirmations. It's fast but carries a risk of being double-spent until confirmed by the blockchain.

wallet.walletNameDesc: Set a name for your wallet.
wallet.avoidAddressReuseDesc: Enable this option to prevent the same address from being used for multiple transactions. This helps protect your privacy.
wallet.xPubKeyDesc: Use this option to export the Extended Public Key of your wallet.
wallet.removeWalletDesc: Use this option to remove the current wallet from the app.
wallet.walletRemoveConfirmationDesc: Removing a wallet doesn't affect its blockchain balance, and you can restore it later. However, make sure you still have the information needed to restore it. Without it, removing the wallet can result in an irreversible loss of funds.

connections.noConnectedApps: You have no connected apps yet.

about.quote: Built in secrecy, sourcing parts from unnamed sources. Roams the seas beyond the reach of land-based governments.
about.donation: Support Nautilus Wallet development by donating to {address}.

sigmaUsd.title: SigmaUSD Protocol
sigmaUsd.blockedAction: Due to current bank reserves, you cannot {action} more than {amount} {asset}.
sigmaUsd.protocolFeeDesc: The Protocol Fee directly contributes to the bank reserves.
sigmaUsd.serviceFeeDesc: Nautilus Wallet charges a flat fee to sustainably fund its development.
sigmaUsd.networkFeeDesc: This is the cost of adding the transaction to the blockchain.

walletOptimizer.title: Wallet Optimizer
walletOptimizer.description: Use this tool merge your UTxOs, boosting performance and avoiding {demurrage} fee.

auth.header: {host} requests a proof that the selected address belongs to you.

signTx.partialTxHeader: {host} requests to partially sign a transaction
